key_talking_points: Goal scored by Sam Bennett of the Florida Panthers at 2:07 of the first period, assisted by Anton Lundell and Brandon Montour. Florida now leads 5-4.
The goal was scored behind the net against Stuart Skinner. It was a wrist shot.
Discuss Bennett's performance this season and his role on the Panthers.
